definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: In addition to admissions and denials, the defendant may also make affirmative defenses and counterclaims in the answer.
sentences.chinese: 除了入學和否認，被告也可在答案肯定防禦和反訴。

sentences.english: The counter-claim system comes from the ancient Roman law.
sentences.chinese: 反訴制度肇始於古代羅馬法。

sentences.english: Lastly, the courtasks the defendant to present his defense and any counterclaims.
sentences.chinese: 最後，法庭要求被告做辯護和進行任何反訴。

sentences.english: The counterclaim system has the functional advantage of incorporating and settling the correlative disputes.
sentences.chinese: 反訴制度具有合併解決相關糾紛的功能優勢。

sentences.english: The defendant may admit or rebut the claims and shall have the right to file counterclaims.
sentences.chinese: 被告可以承認或者反駁訴訟請求，有權提起反訴。
摩托羅拉隨後進行了反訴。

sentences.english: Countercharge system in our country has many defects in reality.
sentences.chinese: 我國的反訴制度起步較晚，在現實中存在很大的缺陷。

sentences.english: O. disputes is for a country being accused of trade violations to file counterclaims.
sentences.chinese: 爭端策略就是被訴違法規則的國家提出反訴。

sentences.english: Mr White countercharged Mr Smith with slander.
sentences.chinese: 懷特先生反訴史密斯先生誹謗。

sentences.english: At noon today, Thunder is also reported to the MPAA counterclaims news.
sentences.chinese: 今日中午，迅雷方面也傳出將反訴MPAA的消息。

sentences.english: Part Two. The second part gives the comparison of counterclaim system in the two families of law.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是關於兩大法系反訴制度的比較。

sentences.english: An answer usually sets forth the defendant's defenses and counterclaims .
sentences.chinese: 辯護狀通常寫也被告的答辯和反訴。

definition: to claim a credit against/tax reduction
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)
debt security/collateralized debt obligation (CDO), type of bond
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
